citeinfo.origin: Fisheries and Oceans Canada - Pacific Region, Institute of Ocean Science, Oceanographic Data Manager
citeinfo.title: Lighthouse SST and SSS - (Canada-West Coast)

descript.abstract: Bucket samples for temperature (thermometer) and salinity (hydrometer) from manned and unmanned British Columbia Coastal Lighthouse Stations. Individual daily measurements have relatively low accuracy and resolution (esp. salinity). Monthly averages are usually used. Some manned stations are being discontinued and observations are being automated. Near real time data available from Amphitrite Point (see plot of current conditions and anomalies on the IOS web site. Other stations may become available in real-time as lighthouse automation continues. Data Sets can be obtained directly at http://www-sci.pac.dfo-mpo.gc.ca/osap/data/SearchTools/Searchlighthouse_e.htm. [ A TCODE project ]

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
